## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code

## For New Site Support
If this PR adds a new shopping site, please confirm:
- [ ] Added site to `manifest.json` host_permissions
- [ ] Added site to content_scripts matches
- [ ] Added site detection in `content.js`
- [ ] Added selectors for size guide and insertion point
- [ ] Tested on at least 5 different products
- [ ] Updated README.md with new site
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md
